body.p: BTS starts automatically during the installation process.
Afterwards BTS is started by double-clicking "bts.exe". After the installation is completed, this file serves to run the software.

BTS installer currently does not create BTS entries in the windows "Start" menu or on the desktop. You can manually create a shortcut of the "bts.exe" and drag-&-drop it into the start menu, taskbar and desktop. Click/double click this icon to start the program.
